#{timing},

SELECT t3.id AS "id" , t3.category_id AS "category.id" , t3.title AS "title" , t3.link AS "link" , t3.color AS "color" , t3.image AS "image" , t3.keywords AS "keywords" , t3.description AS "description" , t3.weight AS "weight" , t3.weight_date AS "weightDate" , t3.hits AS "hits" , t3.posid AS "posid" , t3.custom_content_view AS "customContentView" , t3.view_config AS "viewConfig" , t3.create_by AS "createBy.id" , t3.create_date AS "createDate" , t3.update_by AS "updateBy.id" , t3.update_date AS "updateDate" , t3.shorttile AS shorttile , t3.remarks AS "remarks" , t3.del_flag AS "delFlag" , t3.acquisition_source AS acquisitionSource, c.name_en AS "category.nameEn", d.content AS "articleData.content", m.name AS"msgsource.name", m.url AS "msgsource.url", m.sid AS "msgsource.sid", t3.is_statis as isStatis, t3.static_url as staticUrl, t3.is_mobile_statis as "isMobileStatis" FROM t_position t1 INNER JOIN t_position_article t2 ON t1.posid = t2.posid INNER JOIN cms_article t3 on t3.id = t2.article_id JOIN cms_category c ON c.id = t3.category_id LEFT JOIN cms_article_data d ON d.id = t3.id LEFT JOIN cms_msgsource m ON m.sid =t3.msgid where
t1.type = #{type} and
t3.del_flag in('0' , '3')
ORDER BY t3.weight_date desc, t2.number
ORDER BY t3.weight_date desc, t2.number
desc limit #{index},#{size}
